info.author: Francesco De Carlo and David Vine
info.description: Data Exchange is a Python toolbox for reading and writing Data Exchange files. It provides an interface between tomographic raw datasets collected at different synchrotron facilities and tomoPy, a Python toolbox to perform tomographic data processing and image reconstruction tasks developed at the Advanced Photon Source.
info.maintainer: Francesco De Carlo and David Vine
info.name: data-exchange
info.summary: Interface between tomographic data collected at various synchtron facilities and tomoPy
